title: Richard Poole, Marilyn Crispell, Gary Peacock - In Motion (2016)
description: Richard Poole / Marilyn Crispell / Gary Peacock In Motion 2016 - Intakt Records: Intakt CD 264 http://www.intaktrec.ch/264-a.htm * Richard Poole : drums * Marilyn Crispell: piano * Gary Peacock : bass http://www.richardpoole.com/ http://www.marilyncrispell.com/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gary_Peacock Recorded by Chris Andersen at Nevessa Production Woodstock, Woodstock, New York, on November 6, 2014. Reviews ~~~~~~~ By Eddie Myer http://www.jazzviews.net/richard-poole--marilyn-crispell--gary-peacock---in-motion.html Multi-instrumentalist Poole has carved out an impressively varied career as a composer, collaborator and solo pianist; here he teams up with a pair of legendary musicians, bringing between them the legacy of collaborations with everyone from Ayler to Braxton, for a set of inspired free improvisations. Peacock’s rich, full tone, speedy articulation and perfect intonation are in evidence right from the start, as are Crispell’s delicacy and sureness of touch; all the tunes except Peacock’s “Gary’s Theme” are spontaneously composed in the studio. Such is the empathy between the players that many of the titles have the measured feel of written compositions - “Ahzan” and “Isle Of Nowhere” are full of melodic phrases and subtle rhythmic elisions, and much of the album has a stately, elegaic feel, sometimes exploding into furious free dissonance as in “Dichotomy” before returning just as suddenly to contemplative stillness. [...] -- Intakt Records http://www.intaktrec.ch/rev264-a.htm By Derek Taylor By Patrick Hadfield http://www.londonjazznews.com/2016/04/cd-review-richard-poole-marilyn.html Maciej Krawiec (pl) http://www.jazzarium.pl/przeczytaj/recenzje/motion Jan Granlie (no) http://salt-peanuts.eu/record/poole-crispell-peacock/ Da Maurizio Zerbo (it) http://www.allaboutjazz.com/in-motion-marylin-crispell-intakt-records-review-by-maurizio-zerbo.php Par Pierre Tenne (fr) http://www.djamlarevue.com/blog/2016/3/8/poole Par Philippe Méziat (fr) http://www.citizenjazz.com/Richard-Poole-Marilyn-Crispell-Gary-Peacock.html Por Jesús Gonzalo (es)
